<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs=""
>
[Paired](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1388)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 88</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** each rune applied to a separate item that has pockets

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These runes always come in pairs and can be applied to a garment's pockets to be activated.

<row gap="medium">

</row>

---

You can activate these runes at any distance as long as they're on the same plane.
